mapper.sql: UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, ANA_DASE_ID, SRC_ANA_DASE_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
mapper.select: SELECT A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , A.CRE_COMP_ID , A.ANA_DASE_ID , A.SRC_ANA_DASE_ID , B.ANA_DASE_NM FROM WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV A LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE B ON B.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID AND B.CRE_COMP_ID = A.CRE_COMP_ID WHERE A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV
UDF_OTL_DTC_ID,
CRE_COMP_ID,
ANA_DASE_ID,
SRC_ANA_DASE_ID,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1, 'C', #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now()
mapper.update:
update WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV
ANA_DASE_ID = #{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_ANA_DASE_ID = #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = now()
where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
